extension.description:
Guidebox is a service that scrapes many streaming video sources for streaming links, and provides them in a navigable API. This plugin provides an interface to the API. Fanart is provided by TheMovieDB. Please help by submitting your own artwork!
Currently, I (the developer) provide my own Guidebox API Key. Guidebox limits the number of fetches per minute and per month. If possible, please request your own Guidebox API Key and enter it in the settings to avoid contributing to the fetch caps. If Guidebox ever asks me to pay, I will rescind my API key and ask that users provide their own. Thanks for playing nice!
Dependencies: Chrome Launcher - http://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=170965
